entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 11 March 2023
